title: Will i get the Victorious skin if i got a 14 day suspension 1 month before season ends?
body: i am gold 3 and got a 14 day suspension for joking around with my friends in chat and they told me i wont get my victorious skin now is this true?

replies.body:
[Unfortunately you will not be getting the skin for this year.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility)
Any ban from the 22 of August till the end of the season means you won't be receiving rewards.

And what happens to those people who havent had a single punishment ~~all year~~ in their league lifetime but are still honour level 2 because they don't get all the honours? seems bit unfair for them, not their fault they didn't get honour lv 3, its literally a system based on random numbers and other people, why dont they get the end of season honour rewards too, they could have been a literal angel their entire life, but due to the rng riot loves so much they dont get anything.

you get honour progress regardless of whether you actually get honoured or not. getting honours only speeds it up.

unless you made a new account only recently, literally everyone who's been playing since the start of the year would have hit honour 3 unless you were being reported.
you got it wrong there, riot love their generators, but they are very unfair in some cases due to being random

To clarify something, *the average player* will progress in honour even if they don't receive any actual honours, but if you are demonstrating negative behaviour (even if it's not enough to get you punished ever) you won't progress. Neutral players will still progress, though much slower, but negative players, even if their behaviour isn't all that severe will not progress. This is about being honourable and improving the community after all.

Just to be clear since there was some confusion about this with someone else, this isn't any kind of honour lock, you aren't prevented from progressing, only on a game by game basis it's being determined that you shouldn't be earning honour.
awesome what a joke of a company, trying to have fun with friends cause of this boring game yet they ban me even with an apology in the chat saying its a joke and they still ban me, absolute joke
Your "Friends" reported you leading up to the ban. Even if you swears your heart out and no 1 reported you, no ban would be given. It seem your buddies reported you all together.
clearly your 5 stacks are boring as fuck to play with LOL
I dont stack up with those type like OP's. You know why? because hanging out with such people often lead to disasters.

Yoshi you're actually wrong, any 2 week suspension issued on and after 22/8/17 will result in loss of season rewards, not 8/8/17

Source: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility

But yeah dude, if your ban was issued now you're not getting it ):

yep, no skin for you :)
Every Suspension after August 8 will make you ineligible for season rewards.
